document.heading: National Public Radio Real Property Tax Abatement Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-220, the “National Public Radio Real Property Tax Abatement Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-666, which was referred to the Committee of Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 2008, and July 1, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 7, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-421 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-220 became effective on August 29, 2008.
